QuestData.Title: Cavalry Has Its Place
QuestData.Description:
Evoker! This place still has herds of vorquin!
I managed to round a few up that could be used as mounts for when your wings are tired. Remember how to ride?
This one is to be issued to you as the scalecommanders are ordering you all over the place. Please take good care of it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn to ride your personal vorquin mount.
